#summary LPC313x DIP Development Board

Designed to interface electronics to PCs via a High Speed USB interface.

Design Files are available in [http://code.google.com/p/opendous/source/browse/trunk/Current_Designs/LPC313x-DIP-Board SVN].

* Status * : 2009-11-18 - Development of this board is on hold to focus on the [http://code.google.com/p/opendous/source/browse/trunk/Current_Designs/LPC313x-DIP-Board/LPC313x_Audio_Player LPC313x DAP].

== Features ==

  * Based on [http://www.nxp.com/ NXP] [http://www.standardics.nxp.com/products/lpc3000/lpc313x.lpc314x.lpc315x/ LPC313x]
  * USB Device/Host/OTG Modes supported
  * microSD connector in [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MicroSD SPI Mode]
  * SPI Flash - [http://www.atmel.com/dyn/resources/prod_documents/doc3500.pdf 2Mbyte] or [http://www.atmel.com/dyn/resources/prod_documents/doc3597.pdf 4Mbyte]
  * Miniature ARM reduced JTAG connector [http://search.digikey.com/scripts/DkSearch/dksus.dll?Detail&name=S9006E-08-ND 16pin 8x2 0.05" (1.27mm) SMT] - DBGACK, DBGRQ pins unsupported
  * Choice of two USB connectors - [http://search.digikey.com/scripts/DkSearch/dksus.dll?Detail&name=H2959CT-ND USB-miniB] and/or [http://search.digikey.com/scripts/DkSearch/dksus.dll?Detail&name=151-1082-ND USB-A-Vertical]/[http://search.digikey.com/scripts/DkSearch/dksus.dll?Detail&name=151-1080-ND USB-A] which are logic switchable using the [http://focus.ti.com/docs/prod/folders/print/ts3usb221.html TS3USB221] IC.
  * 3V and 1.2V 1A+ [http://www.st.com/stonline/products/literature/ds/14492/st1l05b.htm ST1L05B] regulators
  * RESET button, status LED, and 2mm jumpers for boot selection
  * 12MHz main crystal and 32.768kHz RTC crystal
  * Dimensions (LxW): 3" x 1" - plugs into standard solder-less breadboard
  * Design is 2-layers with 6mil/6mil Trace/Space and 12mil Vias
